work: Epistle to the Son of the Wolf
author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: و يکی از اجزاء هيکل لوح حضرت امپراطور روس ايّده اللّه تبارک و تعالی است *
translation: One of the sections of the Súratu’l-Haykal is the Tablet addressed to His Majesty, the Czar of Russia - may God, exalted and glorified be He - assist him:
